biotools.summary:
An intuitive and versatile web application for research-data tracking from crystallization experiment to PDB deposition.

IceBear is a research data management tool for structural biology. It currently covers crystallization trials, crystal fishing and shipping, as well as linking crystals, datasets, and PDB depositions for full chain of custody. It gives you a highly task-focused interface and a flexible access rights system. And it's FREE to download and install in your lab.
